Plot: Ham III, the grandson of the first chimp astronaut, is blasted off into space by an opportunity-seeking senator. Soon, the fun-loving chimp has to get serious about the mission at hand; ...
Title: Space Chimps
Writer: Kirk De Micco (screenplay), Robert Moreland (screenplay), Kirk De Micco (story), Jason Mayland (additional screenplay material)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Cheryl Hines, Jeff Daniels, Patrick Warburton
tomatoConsensus: Space Chimps' cheap animation and overabundance of monkey puns feels especially dated in a post-Wall-E world.
